name: The Island Story (itch)
description:
(English language is available!)

The avionette of cocaine smugglers crashes on an unknown island. Only one person survived, who from now on must do everything to get out of the island.

The world is full of strange people, traders, farmers and wild natives who have mastered the island some time searching for oil.

Destroy silos with fuel and cages with animals. Build bridges to discover other parts of the island. Collect useful items and points and buy weapons necessary for survival!

Do the tasks and leave this damned island!


During the game, we come to fight with the natives, collect mushrooms, hunt animals and obtain meat from them, destroy silos with fuel and cages with animals, and also turn on radio antennas to locate the aforementioned boat.

The game supports Xbox controllers and more.

Language: Polish / English

Gameplay time: 2/3h

RAM usage: 800mb
